Commands.Power of the Crystal: Reduces target's BRV to 3/4, then ranged BRV attack + HP attack  Moderately consumes own HP if Chelinka's Prayer not active
Commands.Rela Crystal: Holy magic BRV attack  Self: 2 turns MAX BRV Up II, Chelinka's Prayer  Consumes all BRV upon use if Chelinka's Prayer not already active

Passives.Power of the Crystal Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Power of the Crystal.
Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits.
Passives.BRV Guard Up: Slightly raises Defense when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Rela Crystal Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Rela Crystal.
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Power of the Crystal Charge: Increases the max uses of Power of the Crystal by 1.
Passives.Buff Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV while buffed.
Passives.Rela Crystal Charge: Increases the max uses of Rela Crystal by 1.
Passives.The Twins' Bond: Slightly raises Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack and Defense when Chelinka's Prayer is active.
Passives.Rapid Chelinka's Prayer: Moderately raises SPD while Chelinka's Prayer active
Passives.Crystal Power Extension: When using Crystal Power:   Becomes group attack   Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target   Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%   Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Passives.Chelinka's Prayer Attack: Moderately raises ATK while Chelinka's Prayer active
Passives.Rela Crystal Extension: When using Rela Crystal:   Becomes 2-hit BRV attack with moderately increased cumulative damage   Triggers additional HP attack if BRV is at least 80% of MAX at time of use   Granted effects' duration +2

Weapons.Gladius CP: 15: Increases Power of the Crystal's potency.Makes its first hit lower target's BRV by 1/2 (instead of 1/4).
Weapons.Brave Sword CP: 35: Increases the potency of Rela Crystal, BRV Attack and BRV Attack+.Increases Rela Crystal's max uses by 1.Increases the potency and extends the duration of Max BRV Up and Chelinka's Prayer.
